column4: Tomcat_ I haven't used pppoe for a couple of years, but when I did I had an applet in gnome-panel that did that for me.
thanks (tho I would prefer to configure this at some 'non-X' level ideally)
you can delete .gnome2 and gnome2_private folders in your home directory. but that will make all your settings reset
that's what I want :-)  I'll try that
well, since DRI need DRM to work maybe it IS the number of the beast (a longshot I know and a tiny bit offtopic)
